settings.html:
<style>

        :root {
            --black: #000000;
            --white: #FFFFFF;
            --cream: #FAF6F0;
            --brown: #59473C;
            --accent: #4ECDC4;
            --warning: #F4D03F;
            --danger: #E74C3C;
            --border: 3px solid var(--black);
        }

        * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }
        html { scroll-behavior: smooth; }
        body {
            font-family: 'Sometype Mono', monospace;
            background: var(--cream);
            color: var(--black);
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        .container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; }

        /* STICKY TOC */
        .toc {
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            z-index: 100;
            background: var(--black);
            border-bottom: var(--border);
            padding: 12px 0;
        }
        .toc-inner {
            display: flex;
            gap: 24px;
            overflow-x: auto;
            scrollbar-width: none;
        }
        .toc-inner::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; }
        .toc-link {
            color: var(--white);
            text-decoration: none;
            font-size: 11px;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            white-space: nowrap;
            opacity: 0.7;
            transition: opacity 0.2s;
        }
        .toc-link:hover { opacity: 1; color: var(--accent); }

        /* HERO */
        .hero {
            background: var(--cream);
            padding: 60px 0;
            border-bottom: var(--border);
        }
        .hero-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 400px;
            gap: 40px;
            align-items: start;
        }
        .hero-badges { display: flex; gap: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px; flex-wrap: wrap; }
        .badge {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 4px 12px;
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
        }
        .badge--tier { background: var(--accent); }
        .badge--location { background: var(--white); }
        .badge--date { background: var(--warning); }
        .badge--distance { background: #FFB830; }
        .hero-title {
            font-size: 64px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: -0.02em;
            line-height: 1;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
        }
        .hero-tagline {
            font-size: 18px;
            font-style: italic;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 32px;
        }
        .hero-intro {
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 1.8;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 32px;
            max-width: 540px;
        }

        /* SCORE CARD */
        .score-card {
            background: var(--brown);
            color: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 32px;
        }
        .score-label {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .score-main {
            font-size: 80px;
            font-weight: 700;
            line-height: 1;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
        }
        .score-main span { font-size: 32px; opacity: 0.6; }
        .tier-label {
            font-size: 12px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 24px;
        }
        .score-breakdown {
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            padding-top: 20px;
            margin-top: 20px;
        }
        .breakdown-row {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }
        .breakdown-label {
            font-size: 10px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            opacity: 0.7;
        }
        .breakdown-bar {
            flex: 1;
            height: 8px;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            margin: 0 16px;
        }
        .breakdown-bar-fill { height: 100%; background: var(--accent); }
        .breakdown-score {
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 600;
            min-width: 50px;
            text-align: right;
        }

        /* SECTIONS */
        .section {
            padding: 60px 0;
            border-bottom: var(--border);
        }
        .section--dark { background: var(--brown); color: var(--white); }
        .section--black { background: var(--black); color: var(--white); }
        .section-header { margin-bottom: 40px; }
        .section-kicker {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 4px 12px;
            background: var(--warning);
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        .section-kicker--dark {
            background: transparent;
            border-color: var(--white);
            color: var(--white);
        }
        .section-title {
            font-size: 32px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .section-subtitle {
            font-size: 14px;
            color: var(--brown);
            max-width: 600px;
        }
        .section--dark .section-subtitle,
        .section--black .section-subtitle { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7); }

        /* COURSE MAP */
        .map-container {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
        }
        .map-embed {
            width: 100%;
            height: 500px;
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            background: #f0f0f0;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 14px;
            color: var(--brown);
        }
        .map-stats {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
            margin-top: 24px;
        }

        /* STATS GRID */
        .stats-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .stats-grid--6 { grid-template-columns: repeat(6, 1fr); }
        .stat-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        .stat-value { font-size: 28px; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 4px; }
        .stat-value--large { font-size: 36px; }
        .stat-label {
            font-size: 10px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--brown);
        }
        .stat-sublabel {
            font-size: 9px;
            color: var(--brown);
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin-top: 2px;
        }

        /* HISTORY TIMELINE */
        .timeline { margin-top: 32px; }
        .timeline-item {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 80px 1fr;
            gap: 24px;
            padding: 20px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        .timeline-item:last-child { border-bottom: none; }
        .timeline-year {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--accent);
        }
        .timeline-content { font-size: 13px; line-height: 1.6; }

        /* COURSE BREAKDOWN */
        .course-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .course-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
        }
        .course-card--highlight {
            background: var(--danger);
            color: var(--white);
        }
        .course-card--highlight .course-mile,
        .course-card--highlight .course-desc { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.85); }
        .course-mile {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .course-name {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }
        .course-desc {
            font-size: 12px;
            color: var(--brown);
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        /* RATINGS */
        .rating-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 24px;
        }
        .rating-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 32px;
        }
        .rating-card--dark {
            background: var(--brown);
            color: var(--white);
        }
        .rating-title {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .rating-score { font-size: 48px; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 4px; }
        .rating-score span { font-size: 20px; opacity: 0.6; }
        .rating-label {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .rating-metrics { display: grid; gap: 12px; }
        .rating-metric {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            font-size: 12px;
        }
        .rating-metric-label {
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            width: 100px;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }
        .rating-metric-bar {
            flex: 1;
            height: 12px;
            background: #eee;
            border: 1px solid var(--black);
        }
        .rating-card--dark .rating-metric-bar {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
        }
        .rating-metric-fill { height: 100%; background: var(--accent); }
        .rating-metric-value { font-weight: 700; width: 40px; text-align: right; }
        .rating-explanation {
            margin-top: 24px;
            padding-top: 24px;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        .rating-card--dark .rating-explanation { border-top-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.2); }
        .rating-explanation p {
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 1.7;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }

        /* OPINION */
        .opinion-card {
            background: var(--accent);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 32px;
        }
        .opinion-verdict {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .opinion-title {
            font-size: 24px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        .opinion-text { font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8; margin-bottom: 16px; }
        .opinion-list {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 24px;
            margin-top: 24px;
        }
        .opinion-col-title {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        .opinion-col ul { list-style: none; font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.8; }
        .opinion-col li { padding-left: 16px; position: relative; }
        .opinion-col li::before { content: ">"; position: absolute; left: 0; }

        /* BLACK PILL */
        .blackpill {
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            padding: 60px 0;
            border-bottom: var(--border);
        }
        .blackpill-badge {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            padding: 6px 14px;
            border: 2px solid var(--white);
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
        }
        .blackpill-title {
            font-size: 28px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
            max-width: 700px;
        }
        .blackpill-body {
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 1.8;
            opacity: 0.85;
            max-width: 700px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .blackpill-quote {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-style: italic;
            border-left: 3px solid var(--accent);
            padding-left: 20px;
            margin: 32px 0;
            max-width: 600px;
            line-height: 1.7;
        }
        .forum-quote {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.15);
            padding: 20px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            font-size: 13px;
            line-height: 1.7;
        }
        .forum-quote cite {
            display: block;
            font-size: 10px;
            font-style: normal;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-top: 12px;
            opacity: 0.5;
        }

        /* VERDICT */
        .verdict-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .verdict-card { border: var(--border); padding: 24px; }
        .verdict-card--yes { background: var(--accent); }
        .verdict-card--no { background: var(--white); }
        .verdict-header {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        .verdict-list { list-style: none; }
        .verdict-list li {
            font-size: 13px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            padding-left: 20px;
            position: relative;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }
        .verdict-list li::before {
            content: ">";
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        /* TRAINING PLANS */
        .plans-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr);
            gap: 12px;
        }
        .plan-card {
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 20px 16px;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            transition: transform 0.1s ease;
        }
        .plan-card:hover {
            transform: translate(-2px, -2px);
            box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 var(--black);
        }
        .plan-card--1 { background: var(--cream); }
        .plan-card--2 { background: #FFF8E1; }
        .plan-card--3 { background: var(--warning); }
        .plan-card--4 { background: #FFB830; }
        .plan-card--masters { background: var(--accent); }
        .plan-badge {
            position: absolute;
            top: -10px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            font-size: 8px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            padding: 2px 8px;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .plan-title {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
            margin-top: 8px;
        }
        .plan-desc {
            font-size: 10px;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            min-height: 2em;
        }
        .plan-hours { font-size: 12px; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 12px; }
        .plan-cta {
            display: block;
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            text-decoration: none;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            transition: all 0.1s ease;
        }
        .plan-cta:hover { background: var(--brown); }

        /* LOGISTICS */
        .logistics-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .logistics-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
        }
        .logistics-icon {
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .logistics-title {
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .logistics-value { font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 4px; }
        .logistics-detail { font-size: 11px; color: var(--brown); line-height: 1.6; }

        /* TWO COL */
        .two-col { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 40px; }

        /* BUTTONS */
        .btn {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 14px 28px;
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            text-decoration: none;
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            border: var(--border);
            transition: all 0.1s ease;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        .btn:hover {
            background: var(--brown);
            transform: translate(-2px, -2px);
            box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 var(--black);
        }
        .btn--accent { background: var(--accent); color: var(--black); }
        .btn--outline { background: transparent; color: var(--black); }
        .btn--outline:hover { background: var(--black); color: var(--white); }

        /* FOOTER */
        .footer {
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            padding: 40px 0;
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
        }
        .footer a { color: var(--accent); text-decoration: none; }

        /* RESPONSIVE */
        @media (max-width: 900px) {
            .hero-grid, .two-col, .rating-grid, .opinion-list { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
            .stats-grid, .course-grid, .verdict-grid, .logistics-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
            .stats-grid--6, .map-stats { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
            .plans-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
            .hero-title { font-size: 40px; }
        }
    
</style>

TIER 1 / ICONIC KETCHUM, IDAHO 2025: September 5-6 103 MI

Rebecca's Private Idaho

"Where the Queen of Pain invites you to suffer beautifully."

Where gravel royalty meets grassroots community. The event Rebecca built in her backyard.

GET YOUR TRAINING PLAN
Gravel God Rating
85/100
TIER 1 / HIGH CONSEQUENCE
Course Profile
25 / 35
Biased Opinion
31 / 35
Course Map Course Vitals Facts & History The Course The Ratings Biased Opinion The Black Pill Final Verdict Training Plans Race Logistics

[03] FACTS & HISTORY

How It Became THE Race

Created by legendary endurance athlete Rebecca Rusch to share her backyard with the gravel community. What started as an intimate gathering has become one of gravel's marquee events.

Where gravel royalty meets grassroots community. The event Rebecca built in her backyard.

Key Moments
[04] THE COURSE

Key Moments on the Route

Big mountain beauty with sustained but manageable climbing. Not the steepest grades, but relentless.

Mile 30
Trail Creek Climb
The signature climb. Long and steady. Pace yourself.
Mile 65
Afternoon Exposure
Open terrain, sun beating down, halfway fatigue settling in.
Mile 90
Final Challenge
You can see Ketchum. But there's still climbing between you and the finish.
[05] THE RATINGS

Course Profile Analysis

Course Profile Score
25/35
RADAR BREAKDOWN
Length
4/5
Technicality
3/5
Elevation
4/5
Climate
3/5
Altitude
4/5
Adventure
5/5
Logistics
3/5
What Each Score Means

Length (4/5): 100+ miles is serious distance. The course isn't ultra-extreme, but combining that mileage with 8,500 feet of climbing and altitude creates a proper full-day challenge.

Technicality (3/5): The gravel is generally good quality—fast and predictable. Some sections get chunky, descents require attention, but this isn't a bike-handling test. It's a fitness and pacing race.

Elevation (4/5): 8,500 feet in 100+ miles is meaningful but manageable. The grades are steady rather than steep. Climbers have an advantage, but diesels can survive.

Climate (3/5): September in Idaho is usually beautiful. Mornings are cool, afternoons pleasant. The main variable is early fall weather—pack a layer in case temperatures drop.

Altitude (4/5): Racing between 6,000-8,000 feet matters. Sea-level riders will feel it. Arrive 2-3 days early minimum. It's not Leadville-level, but it's not trivial.

Adventure (5/5): The Sawtooth Mountains are world-class scenery. Sun Valley is a destination. This isn't just a race—it's a reason to explore one of America's most beautiful regions.

[06] BIASED OPINION

The Verdict

RPI is what happens when a legendary athlete shares her passion with the community. It's not the hardest race, not the longest, not the most technical—but it might be the most soulful. The combination

Editorial Profile
31/35
OPINION SCORE
Prestige

What Each Score Means

Prestige (5/5): Rebecca Rusch built this, hosts it, and races it. When a 4x world champion invites you to her backyard, you show up. The event has grown but maintained its intimate, athlete-first vibe.

Length (4/5): 100+ miles is serious distance. The course isn't ultra-extreme, but combining that mileage with 8,500 feet of climbing and altitude creates a proper full-day challenge.

Technicality (3/5): The gravel is generally good quality—fast and predictable. Some sections get chunky, descents require attention, but this isn't a bike-handling test. It's a fitness and pacing race.

Elevation (4/5): 8,500 feet in 100+ miles is meaningful but manageable. The grades are steady rather than steep. Climbers have an advantage, but diesels can survive.

Climate (3/5): September in Idaho is usually beautiful. Mornings are cool, afternoons pleasant. The main variable is early fall weather—pack a layer in case temperatures drop.

Altitude (4/5): Racing between 6,000-8,000 feet matters. Sea-level riders will feel it. Arrive 2-3 days early minimum. It's not Leadville-level, but it's not trivial.

Adventure (5/5): The Sawtooth Mountains are world-class scenery. Sun Valley is a destination. This isn't just a race—it's a reason to explore one of America's most beautiful regions.

[X] THE BLACK PILL

THE THING NOBODY TELLS YOU

The race is beautiful, the community is real—but the logistics aren't cheap. Sun Valley is a ski resort. Hotels cost accordingly. If you're on a budget, this race takes some planning.

  • Lodging: Book 6+ months early. Expect $200-400/night for decent options.
  • Travel: Boise is the closest major airport. That's 2.5 hours to Ketchum.
  • The Queen's Stage is real racing. If you enter it thinking 'charity ride,' you'll get humbled.
"This is a premium experience at premium prices. Budget accordingly. The race itself is worth it—but only if you can swing the logistics without stress."
[07] FINAL VERDICT

Is This Race For You?

[+] Race This If:
  • The host: Rebecca Rusch is there, racing, cheering, hugging finishers. It's personal.
  • The scenery: Sawtooth Mountains are bucket-list beautiful.
  • The community: Post-race party is legendary. People come for the race, stay for the vibes.
[-] Skip This If:
  • Travel: Ketchum is remote. Expect a drive from Boise (2+ hours).
  • Cost: Sun Valley prices. Lodging isn't cheap.
  • Competition: The Queen's Stage brings serious racers. Don't expect a chill ride.
[08] TRAINING PLANS

Get Ready for Rebecca's Private Idaho

5 ways to prepare. Pick what fits your life.

Level 1
Time Crunched
Minimal time, HIIT-focused
0-5 hrs/week
$100
Level 2
Finisher
Traditional base building
8-10 hrs/week
